file_content.text: Weapons on the floor! Hands where I can see them!
Back up to the wall. Slowly....
I'm supposed to be here. So let's chat about why you disagree....
Whoa. Calm down.
Who are you?
Lieutenant Kollis, Republic Armed Forces. Now tell me who you are.
There's been a misunderstanding. This is an authorized mission.
You've got it all wrong. The captain's a genuine Republic privateer.
Republic business! No questions.
Do you really wish to challenge us?
Wait a minute.
I was sent by a Galactic Senator, buddy, so holster it.
Back off.
What are you talking about--oh, blast! The privateer?
Are you the one Major Panin was expecting? From the lady Senator?
Then... nope, I still can't guess why you'd be doing this.
Never trust a Jedi to get something done. He'll probably call you when the stars align.
You should have been briefed.
The sensors are for an important trade.
I'm on a covert mission.
Then you should have requisitioned them. You just destroyed some of our last functioning droids.
You think our friendly Jedi was less helpful than he seemed?
It was all the Jedi's idea! That sounds really weird when I say it out loud....
The Jedi lied.
So, Jedi lie, too. What a surprise.
Did you talk to anyone at the base? You could have gotten these on a Senator's orders, easy.
Why do I get the feeling that Major Panin doesn't have a wisecracking, Mon Calamari Jedi advisor?
I talked to someone....
The only advisor Major Panin had was a human Padawan. She was killed in the attack.
Major Panin's Jedi advisor was supposed to warn you.
This is all a misunderstanding.
Actually, I should go back and talk to him.
I've got to go.
Well, I'll need you to fill out an incident report and--where are you going with those sensors? Sir!
I'm guessing I was set up. What do you know about Major Panin's Jedi advisor?
I can.
Jedi? You mean Padawan Geana? She was with Major Panin during the attack. Died in the same blast.
Ooh, I wouldn't want to be Languss Tuno right now.
He duped us? What's the world coming to when you can't trust just anyone in a brown robe?
We need to have a word with this false Jedi.
The false Jedi will pay.
Somebody lied to you.
Look, take the sensors. I just need you to fill out an incident report and... never mind.
We'll talk later.
